overview: This video slideshow features calming imagery and guided meditations that let you use the soothing power of nature -- rather than the power of potions or pills -- to unwind and to combat rising stress levels. Volume 1 is part of a three-disc series that showcases extraordinary sunrises and sunsets, awe-inspiring mountain vistas, rolling farmlands, colorful flowers, rushing streams and cascading waterfalls.
title: Natural Healing: Vol. 1
